search.query: `BlockSearch` | top 0 UserName showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, FileName as "File Name"
| savedsearch "File Blocks" | where TotalField="Total" | transpose | rename column as Computer "row 1" as Blocks | where isnum(Blocks) AND Computer!="total" | sort -Blocks
`BlockSearch` | top 0 FileName showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, FileName as "File Name"
`BlockSearch` | top 0 ProcessFileName showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, ProcessFileName as Process

`BlockSearch` FileHash!="" | eval msgtime=strptime(MessageTime, "%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p") | sort 0 -msgtime | stats first(FileTrust) as TrustValue by FileHash | top 0 TrustValue showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, TrustValue as "File Trust" | sort -"File Trust"

table.title: Hashes by File Trust (Populated from bar graph click)

search.query: `BlockSearch` | eval msgtime=strptime(MessageTime, "%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S %p") | sort 0 -msgtime | stats first(FileTrust) as TrustValue by FileHash | where TrustValue=$trustV$ | fields + FileHash
`BlockSearch` RuleName!="" | top 0 RuleName showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, RuleName as Rule
`BlockSearch` | top 0 EventSubType showperc=false | rename count as Blocks, EventSubType as Reason
